code: var addItem=function addItem(product){return{type:"ADD_ITEM",payload:product};};var removeItem=function removeItem(product){return{type:"REMOVE_ITEM",payload:product};};var increase=function increase(product){return{type:"INCREASE",payload:product};};var decrease=function decrease(product){return{type:"DECREASE",payload:product};};var checkout=function checkout(){return{type:"CHECKOUT"};};var clear=function clear(){return{type:"CLEAR"};};export{addItem,removeItem,increase,decrease,checkout,clear};
